org.elasticsearch.index.mapper.geo

Class GeoPointFieldMapper.Encoding

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.index.mapper.geo.GeoPointFieldMapper.Encoding
  • Enclosing class:
    GeoPointFieldMapper

    public static final class GeoPointFieldMapper.Encoding
extends Object
    A byte-aligned fixed-length encoding for latitudes and longitudes.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GeoPoint decode(byte[] in, int offset, GeoPoint out)
      Decode a geo point from a byte-array, reading numBytes() bytes.

      Decode a geo point from the bits of the encoded latitude and longitudes.

      Decode a sequence of bits into the original coordinate.

      Return the bits that encode a latitude/longitude.

    • Method Detail

      • of

        public static final GeoPointFieldMapper.Encoding of(int numBytesPerValue)
        Get an instance based on the number of bytes that has been used to encode values.

      • of

        public static final GeoPointFieldMapper.Encoding of(DistanceUnit.Distance precision)
        Get an instance based on the expected precision. Here are examples of the number of required bytes per value depending on the expected precision:
        • 1km: 4 bytes
        • 3m: 6 bytes
        • 1m: 8 bytes
        • 1cm: 8 bytes
        • 1mm: 10 bytes

      • precision

        public DistanceUnit.Distance precision()

      • numBytes

        public final int numBytes()
        The number of bytes required to encode a single geo point.
